stories.text:
1. just 2 days on it... I buy a Super Boost to test it, thinking it can be used whenever and for however long you need ( ie 5min, 1hr, etc ) -- OOOOH no! Enter Dark Pattern #1394--They dont tell you it's a 1-time shot!!

I write them a request for the refund...

They replied:

"Thanks for writing in. After a routine review of your Tinder account, we found that it violated our Terms of Use and/or Community Guidelines. As a result, your account was removed and banned from Tinder. You will no longer be able to access your Tinder account or create new accounts in the future...

re: refund Also, if you've made an in-app purchase using your Apple ID, refund requests are handled directly by Apple, not Tinder."

>>> I swear on my ex-Wife's life...I not doing anything out of the norm!

... followed up ...and they replied:

"Thanks for following up.

We take violations of our Terms of Service and Community Guidelines very seriously. Please note that we do not have an appeals process at this time, therefore your account will remain banned from Tinder. You will not be able to create a new Tinder profile using your Facebook account and/or phone number.

Please refer to our Terms of Service (www.gotinder.com/terms) and Community Guidelines (www.gotinder.com/community-guidelines) for more information.

Also, while we would like to help you with your subscription, Apple handles all transactions directly, including refunds. If you’ve already contacted them and have been informed you’re not eligible for a refund, we will not be able to dispute it on your behalf. For additional details, please visit their Terms and Conditions: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/us/terms.html"

BRAVO TINDER!! Take all my $, then PERMAban me with ZERO tolerance and clarification. Excellent Business Model you got there.
stories.title: Tell HN: Tinder PREMABanned Me..and also took my $$$
